resources.string:
**Features**
 **•** Added option to show pay for shifts on home page
 **•** Added co-workers without shifts to the people tab
 
 **Fixes**
 **•** Shows and sorts by preferred names over legal names
 **•** Updating info is consistent and functional
 **•** Logging in should be more consistent
 **•** Notifications show cached version when network unavailable
